Anticheat Bypass.name: Be khoa chong gian lan
Anticheat Bypass.desc: Vo hieu hoa tat ca cac chong gian lan. [Cap do, Trinh chinh sua, v.v.]

Practice Music.name: Mo khoa Practice Music
Practice Music.desc: Kich hoat Practice Music mien phi ngay ca khi no bi khoa.

Safe Mode.name: Che Do An Toan
Safe Mode.desc: Tam dung moi tien trinh dang duoc thuc hien o cap do.

Auto Safe Mode.name: Che do an toan tu dong
Auto Safe Mode.desc: Ngan chan bat ky tien trinh nao duoc thuc hien neu mot so manh gian lan nhat dinh duoc kich hoat.

Accurate Percentage.name: Ty le chinh xac
Accurate Percentage.desc: Cho phep so thap phan trong ty le phan tram cap do. [Vuot qua vi tri hang nghin]

Layout Mode.name: Che do bo cuc
Layout Mode.desc: Loai bo tat ca cac trang tri lien quan den mot cap do.

No Transition.name: Khong chuyen doi
No Transition.desc: Rut ngan thoi gian chuyen canh xuong 0 giay.

Cheat Indicator.name: Chi bao gian lan
Cheat Indicator.desc: Hien thi mot bieu tuong de cho biet ban co dang su dung cac mod co the bi coi la gian lan hay khong!

Speedhack.name: Hack toc do
Speedhack.desc: Thay doi toc do cua tro choi va am thanh.

FPS Bypass.name: Be Khoa FPS
FPS Bypass.desc: Mo khoa FPS cua ban de cao hon 60 hoac toc do lam moi man hinh cua ban.

Reset Speedhack.name: Dat lai hack toc do
Reset Speedhack.desc: Dat lai hack toc do tro lai binh thuong.

Noclip.name: Noclip
Noclip.desc: Lam cho nguoi choi bat kha chien bai.

No Spikes.name: Khong co gai
No Spikes.desc: Bo qua cac vat the nhon.

No Hitbox.name: Khong co Hitbox
No Hitbox.desc: Vo hieu hoa tat ca cac hitbox doi tuong. Cac doi tuong dac biet bi vo hieu hoa.

No Solids.name: Khong co chat ran
No Solids.desc: Vo hieu hoa hau het cac hitbox vung chac. Cac do vat dac biet van hoat dong.

No Mirror Transition.name: Khong co chuyen doi guong
No Mirror Transition.desc: Ngan chan man hinh bi lat tren cong guong.

Instant Mirror Portal.name: Cong guong tuc thi
Instant Mirror Portal.desc: Cong dao nguoc bay gio chuyen doi ngay lap tuc.

Freeze Player.name: Nguoi choi dong bang
Freeze Player.desc: Dong bang nguoi choi trong luc di chuyen.

Jump Hack.name: Hack nhay (Nhay khong khi)
Jump Hack.desc: Cho phep nhay giua khong trung.

Instant Complete.name: Hoan thanh cap do ngay lap tuc
Instant Complete.desc: Hoan thanh cap do ngay lap tuc. (Khong bat trong Trinh chinh sua)

Force Platformer Mode.name: Luon luon la che do Platformer
Force Platformer Mode.desc: Buoc ban phai o che do platformer khi choi mot cap do.

Change Gravity.name: Thay doi trong luc
Change Gravity.desc: Cho phep ban thay doi trong luc khi nhay hoac roi.

Gravity Value.name: Gia tri trong luc
Gravity Value.desc: Gia tri trong luc nen duoc dat thanh.

Icon Bypass.name: Mo khoa Bieu tuong
Icon Bypass.desc: Mo khoa tat ca cac bieu tuong.

Text Length.name: Do dai van ban
Text Length.desc: Cho phep do dai van ban khong gioi han khi nhap van ban.

Character Filter.name: Bo loc ky tu
Character Filter.desc: Cho phep ban nhap bat ky ky tu nao trong tat ca cac kieu nhap van ban.

Slider Limit.name: Gioi han thanh truot
Slider Limit.desc: Cho phep keo thanh truot vuot qua gioi han hien thi.

Main Levels.name: Cap do chinh
Main Levels.desc: Mo khoa cac cap do quy bi khoa.

Guard Vault.name: Ham bao ve
Guard Vault.desc: Mo khoa ham cua nguoi bao ve.

Keymaster Vault.name: Bac thay chia khoa Vault
Keymaster Vault.desc: Mo khoa kho tien cua keymaster.

Free Shop Items.name: Mien phi vat pham o cua hang
Free Shop Items.desc: Cho phep mua tat ca cac vat pham trong cua hang voi 0 orbs mana.

Gatekeeper Vault.name: Nguoi gac cong
Gatekeeper Vault.desc: Mo khoa ham cua Nguoi gac cong.

Backup Stars Limit.name: Gioi han sao du phong
Backup Stars Limit.desc: Cho phep ban sao luu du lieu, ngay ca voi it hon 10 sao.

Level Edit.name: Cap do Chinh sua
Level Edit.desc: Cho phep ban chinh sua o moi cap do, truy cap trinh chinh sua thong qua menu tam dung. (KHONG ON DINH)

Verify Hack.name: Gian lan xac minh
Verify Hack.desc: Cho phep ban tai len cac cap do chua duoc xac minh. Se tu dong thiet lap cac cap do de duoc xac minh.

Copy Hack.name: Be khoa sao chep
Copy Hack.desc: Cho phep ban sao chep moi cap do ma khong can mat khau.

No (C) Mark.name: Khong co dau (C)
No (C) Mark.desc: Loai bo dau (C) khi tai len cac cap do da sao chep. Se tu dong thiet lap muc do ban dau.

Hide Testmode.name: An che do kiem tra
Hide Testmode.desc: An van ban 'Testmode' khi choi voi startpos.

Rotation Hack.name: Hack xoay
Rotation Hack.desc: Cho phep ban xoay bat ky doi tuong nao. Chi hoat dong cuc bo.

Default Song Bypass.name: Be khoa bai hat mac dinh
Default Song Bypass.desc: Cho phep ban su dung cac bai hat mac dinh an trong trinh chinh sua.

No Progress Bar.name: Khong co thanh tien trinh
No Progress Bar.desc: Loai bo thanh tien trinh! Ty le phan tram van se duoc hien thi.

Progress Bar Position.name: Vi tri thanh tien trinh
Progress Bar Position.desc: Dat vi tri cua thanh tien trinh.

Hide Attempts.name: An Attempt
Hide Attempts.desc: Nhan Attempts co duoc hien thi hay khong khi choi mot cap do.

Attempt Opacity.name: Do mo cua Attempts
Attempt Opacity.desc: Xac dinh muc do mo cua nhan Attempts.

Enable Patching.name: Kich hoat tinh nang va loi
Enable Patching.desc: Thay doi tu hooking sang patching. Dieu nay cung cho phep kich hoat nhieu ban hack hon. Chi kich hoat neu can thiet. [Chi danh cho Windows]

Menu Opacity.name: Do mo cua menu
Menu Opacity.desc: Xac dinh do mo cua menu.

Theme.name: Chu de
Theme.desc: Chon chu de giao dien nguoi dung cho Menu Prism!

Live Theme Editing.name: Chinh sua chu de truc tiep
Live Theme Editing.desc: Dieu nay se cho phep ban chinh sua chu de tuy chinh cua minh trong khi xem cac thay doi tren man hinh! (Canh bao: Dieu nay co the gay ro ri bo nho.)

Show tooltips.name: Hien thi chu giai cong cu
Show tooltips.desc: Chu giai cong cu co duoc hien thi hay khong khi di chuot qua mod.

Show Button.name: Nut hien thi
Show Button.desc: Hien thi nut de kich hoat menu. Ban nen bat tinh nang nay cho Android.

Button Position X.name: Vi tri nut X
Button Position X.desc: Vi tri X cho nut mo menu.

Button Position Y.name: Vi tri nut Y
Button Position Y.desc: Vi tri Y cho nut mo menu.

Language.name: Ngon ngu
Language.desc: Dat ngon ngu cho Prism Menu!

Restore Defaults.name: Khoi phuc mac dinh
Restore Defaults.desc: Vo hieu hoa tat ca cac mod va dat lai moi thu ve mac dinh.

Credits.name: Dong Gop
Credits.desc: Moi nguoi da giup do mod!

Thank you to Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR),.name: Cam on Electrify (ES), Jouca (FR), dank_meme01, savvacorgi, МегаСвятой (RU), Gazonk (BR), tienanh109 (VI) , huhnmitferrari (DE) va Ignis (CS) vi da dich!

And thank you for using the mod! I hope.name: Va cam on ban da su dung mod! Toi hy vong ban thich su dung Prism Menu!

Menu Scale.name: Kich thuoc menu
Menu Scale.desc: Quyet dinh kich thuoc cua van ban va cac nut. (Se yeu cau khoi dong lai tro choi)

Show Hidden Objects.name: Hien thi cac doi tuong an
Show Hidden Objects.desc: Hien thi tat ca cac doi tuong an. Dieu nay se dat lai mau chinh cua doi tuong. Dieu nay se khong hoat dong tren cac doi tuong co thuoc tinh "An". (Huu ich voi Che do bo cuc)

Transparent BG.name: Nen trong suot
Transparent BG.desc: Tu dong hoan nguyen cac mau da thay doi o nen thanh mau goc.

Speedhack Audio.name: Hack toc do am thanh
Speedhack Audio.desc: Co hay khong thay doi toc do am thanh dua tren gia tri speedhack.

No Glow.name: Khong vien sang
No Glow.desc: Vo hieu hoa anh sang tren tat ca cac doi tuong.

Noclip Accuracy.name: Do chinh xac cua Noclip
Noclip Accuracy.desc: Thong bao cho ban muc do chinh xac cua lan chay noclip cua ban.

Show Graphic Options.name: Hien thi tuy chon do hoa
Show Graphic Options.desc: Hien thi cho ban cac tuy chon do hoa cua Geometry Dash! Huu ich cho Android vi tuy chon nay thuong khong co san.

No Trail.name: Khong co duong mon
No Trail.desc: Vo hieu hoa bat ky hieu ung dau vet nao tu trinh phat.

No Wave Trail.name: Khong co vet song
No Wave Trail.desc: Vo hieu hoa dau vet phia sau lan song.

Solid Wave Trail.name: Duong mon song Wave
Solid Wave Trail.desc: Loai bo su hoa tron cua ca hai mau bieu tuong tren vet song.

Extra Percent Digits.name: Chu so phan tram bo sung
Extra Percent Digits.desc: So chu so thap phan bo sung se duoc hien thi voi Ty le phan tram chinh xac.

Uncomplete Level.name: Cap do chua hoan thanh
Uncomplete Level.desc: Dat lai ty le phan tram binh thuong va thuc hanh, dong thoi cho phep ban giam so sao neu ban hoan thanh cap do!

No Shaders.name: Khong co Shader
No Shaders.desc: Tat tat ca cac hieu ung do bong cua may anh..

Disable Camera Effects.name: Tat hieu ung may anh
Disable Camera Effects.desc: Vo hieu hoa moi hieu ung may anh va chi tap trung may anh vao trinh phat. Dieu nay co the pha vo tat ca cac che do tro choi ngoai tru Cube va Robot.

Show Hitboxes.name: Hien thi Hitbox
Show Hitboxes.desc: Hien thi nguoi choi, chuong ngai vat va hop sat thuong vung chac.

Show Hitboxes on Death.name: Hien thi Hitbox khi chet
Show Hitboxes on Death.desc: Hien thi cac hop sat thuong khi ban chet va an chung khi ban hoi sinh.

Hitbox Stroke.name: Cu danh Hitbox
Hitbox Stroke.desc: Vuot ve 'chieu rong' khi ve cac hop sat thuong.

TPS Bypass.name: Be khoa TPS
TPS Bypass.desc: Doi "Physics FPS" cua tro choi cao hon hoac thap hon mac dinh. (240)

Macro.name: Ban ghi Macro
Macro.desc: Chon macros de ghi hoac phat macros

Record.name: Ghi
Record.desc: Ghi lai gameplay de phat lai. (Dieu nay se dat lai cac dau vao hien tai neu ban choi mot cap do va chon macro.)

Macro Editor.name: Trinh chinh sua Macro
Macro Editor.desc: Vao trinh chinh sua Macro. (Se khong hoat dong binh thuong khi dang ghi)

Frame Fix.name: Sua khung hinh
Frame Fix.desc: Ghi lai moi chuyen dong cua nguoi choi, bao gom ca vi tri khi ghi va phat lai macro. Xin luu y rang tuy chon nay se tang kich thuoc tep cua macro trong khi ghi.

Fixed FPS.name: Sua FPS
Fixed FPS.desc: Khoa cac khung theo toc do khung hinh muc tieu cua macro. Dieu nay co ve giong nhu tuy chon "sua loi muot ma" duoc bat neu tro choi bi lag.

No Pulse.name: Khong Pulse
No Pulse.desc: Vo hieu hoa cac qua cau va cac vat the lien quan khac phat xung theo nhac.

Noclip Flash.name: Den nhay Noclip
Noclip Flash.desc: Nhap nhay toan bo man hinh mau do thay vi hien thi nhan de dam bao do chinh xac cua noclip cua ban.

Instant Respawn.name: Hoi sinh tuc thi
Instant Respawn.desc: Loai bo do tre khi thu lai cap do.

No Death Effect.name: Khong co hieu ung khi chet
No Death Effect.desc: Loai bo cac hat no khi nguoi choi chet.

No Wave Pulse.name: Khong Wave Pulse
No Wave Pulse.desc: Ngan chan song dap theo nhip nhac.

Wave Pulse Size.name: Kich thuoc Wave Pulse
Wave Pulse Size.desc: Xung phai lon nhu the nao doi voi song.

Auto Safe Mode.name: Che do an toan tu dong
Auto Safe Mode.desc: Ngan chan bat ky tien trinh nao duoc thuc hien neu mot so manh gian lan nhat dinh duoc kich hoat.

Custom Object Bypass.name: Bo qua doi tuong tuy chinh
Custom Object Bypass.desc: Cho phep ban vuot qua gioi han 1000 doi tuong cho cac doi tuong tuy chinh.

Menu Keybind.name: Lien ket phim menu
Menu Keybind.desc: To hop phim de mo giao dien nguoi dung cua Prism Menu!

Hide Level.name: An cap do
Hide Level.desc: An tat ca vat the o cap do ban choi

Hide Player.name: An nguoi choi
Hide Player.desc: An nguoi choi (Yeu cau choi lai cap do)

No Rotate.name: Khong xoay
No Rotate.desc: Lam nguoi choi khong bi xoay khi ket thuc hoac dang choi

Low FPS Pause.name: Dung cap do khi FPS thap
Low FPS Pause.desc: Tu đong tam dung tro choi khi FPS giam xuong mot gia tri cu the.

Pause below FPS.name: Tam dung duoi FPS
Pause below FPS.desc: FPS toi thieu truoc khi tro choi tu đong tam dung.

Auto Clicker.name: Tu dong nhap chuot
Auto Clicker.desc: Tu dong nhap chuot cho ban.

Clicks per second.name: Nhap chuot moi giay (hay la chi so CPS)
Clicks per second.desc: So lan ma trinh nhap tu đong phai nhap moi giay.

Always Show Trail.name: Luon luon hien thi dau vet
Always Show Trail.desc: Luon luon hien thi dau vet phia sau nguoi choi.

Show Hitbox Trail.name: Hien thi vung va cham
Show Hitbox Trail.desc: Hien thi vung va cham phia sau nguoi choi.

Hitbox Trail Length.name: Do dai duong mon Hitbox
Hitbox Trail Length.desc: Khoang cach tu hitbox den phia sau nguoi choi dai bao nhieu.

Menu Transition.name: Chuyen doi menu
Menu Transition.desc: (Chi danh cho Geometry Dash) Neu co hoat anh bat len khi mo menu.

Export to JSON.name: Xuat sang JSON
Export to JSON.desc: Xuat macro cua ban sang JSON! (.gdr.json)
